/opt/rocm/bin/hipcc    -std=c++11 -Wno-deprecated-declarations -Wno-unused-command-line-argument -mcpu=gfx906 -O3 -DNDEBUG   -Wl,-rpath=/opt/rh/devtoolset-7/root/usr/lib64 -Wl,-rpath=/opt/rh/devtoolset-7/root/usr/lib CMakeFiles/client.dir/Client.cpp.o CMakeFiles/client.dir/MathTemplates.cpp.o CMakeFiles/client.dir/SolutionHelper.cpp.o CMakeFiles/client.dir/Tools.cpp.o CMakeFiles/client.dir/Solutions.cpp.o CMakeFiles/client.dir/Kernels.cpp.o  -o client -rdynamic /opt/rocm/lib/libhsa-runtime64.so -Wl,-rpath,/opt/rocm/lib
